templates.template: <xf:macro id="cv6_fa_icon::cv6_inputIcon" arg-target="cv6-property-nr-{$property.property_id}" arg-rowclass="{$rowClass}" arg-name="{$formBaseKey}" arg-label="{$titleHtml}" arg-hint="{$hintHtml}" arg-explain="{$property.description}" arg-value="{$property.property_value}" arg-stylechooser="{{ [ $valueOptions.style == 1 ? 'style' : '', $valueOptions.rotation == 1 ? 'rotation' : '' , $valueOptions.animation == 1 ? 'animation' : ''] }}" />
